title: Mental Health Education for Middle-Aged and Elderly Adults: Constructivist Collaborative Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic psychology and understanding of curriculum development
context.additional_context: A mixed environment of experienced educators and adult learners, enhancing mental health literacy using language education expertise.

learning_goals: Learners can measure their stress levels in three or more ways using a mental health self-assessment tool.
Learners can collaboratively write one practical proposal with peers to address community mental health issues.
Learners can conduct and provide feedback on two or more mental health case analyses using a constructivist approach in an online discussion platform.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
